actions.text: Mr. Simpson raised a point of order against the Pearce amendment (A030). Mr. Simpson stated that the provisions of the amendment seek to propose a new limitation on transfer of funds. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Pearce.

description: On page 263, line 22, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduce by $2,590,000)".    On page 264, line 3, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $2,750,000)". ***.
purpose: An amendment numbered 556 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding for the "Department of the Interior, Construction and Land Acquisition" by $239,045,000 and apply the amount to the deficit reduction account.
